trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> objects.
A ConnectionStringSettingsCollection object contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> objects.
Each <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object represents a single entry in the `<connectionStrings>` configuration-file section.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>对象表示中的一项`<connectionStrings>`配置文件部分。</xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object to the collection.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object to add to the collection.
To be added.
To be added.
Removes all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 中删除所有<xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref>从集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all the connection strings from the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level and writes a `<clear>` tag in the file.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法从当前配置层次结构级别上的配置文件中删除所有连接字符串并写入`<clear>`文件中的标记。

trans-unit.source: The `<clear>` tag signifies that all the connection strings defined in the parent configuration files are disregarded by the system.
trans-unit.target: `<clear>`标记表示系统已忽略的父配置文件中定义的所有连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Returns the collection index of the passed <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回传入的集合索引<xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
The collection index of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the connection string at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置集合中的指定索引处的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，此属性是<xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>类</xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>的索引器

trans-unit.source: The index of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object with the specified name in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref>具有指定名称的集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，此属性是<xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>类</xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>的索引器

trans-unit.source: The name of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object with the specified name; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref>对象具有指定名称; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 中移除指定<xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref>从集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 删除<xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref>集合中的指定索引处的对象。
